start_content.title: Musical dreams
start_content.text:
Create unforgettable concert events
 and share your musical passion

card_1.title: Music History
card_1.text: Music has a long and fascinating history, dating back thousands of years. From primitive instruments and folk songs to modern musical genres, music has always been an important part of culture and society.

card_2.title: Music Values
card_2.text: Music has an extraordinary power to influence people. It can evoke different emotions, inspire, uplift and unite people. It is an expression of self-expression and a way to communicate without words.

card_3.title: Great Music Artists
card_3.text: The history of music is full of unforgettable artists who have left a lasting mark on the world of music. From classical composers such as Ludwig van Beethoven and Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart to rock icons such as The Beatles and Queen.

card_1.title: Basia
card_1.text: Rock legend, complicated rhymes are her games. He has the magic of creation, which makes him unrivaled on stage.

card_2.title: Baker
card_2.text: A prodigious talent, he raps with passion and speed, like a street poet. His lyrics are the essence of life on the streets of the city.

card_3.title: Neo
card_3.text: Hiphop of the future, he rhymes about technology and social change. His flow is as futuristic as his lyrics, which flow like a stream of data.

card_4.title: Alicja
card_4.text: She tells stories from real life, and there is a depth of emotion in her songs. Alicia's words penetrate the soul, conveying real experiences from the mountains
